```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```
Loading the data
```{r}
neighbor_data = 
  read_excel("./Data/temp_data.xlsx", sheet = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(median_age = as.numeric(median_age))
```
Creating table
```{r}
descriptive_stats=neighbor_data %>% 
  mean(median_age)
```
